title: My opinion
text:
Among Us is a really fun and enjoyable game that I can play every day. It is capable of using up all the storage on iPhone, which I like. And the game will never die as I know it. My issues with the game is:
1. The iOS and Android version of Among Us isn’t as smooth as PC version of Among Us, which can be found on Steam, Microsoft Store, Epic Games, etc. The PC version of Among Us is capable of 60hz refresh rate or higher, but the mobile version of Among Us is only capable of 45hz.
2. In the mobile versions of Among Us, you can’t use these common symbols: (“ ‘), but the PC versions of Among Us are probably capable of those!
3. When you tap an UI element with one finger in Mobile Among Us, it doesn’t turn green like it does on PC!
4. The graphics tab in Mobile Among Us settings isn’t as advanced as the graphics tab in PC Among Us settings!
Those 4 issues are my biggest problems with Among Us, and in the next big update, I want you to fix the low refresh rate problem on Mobile Among Us, the (“ ‘) symbols not working on Mobile Among Us chat, elements not turning green when you tap them with 1 finger in Mobile Among Us, and the basic Graphics Tab issue in Mobile Among Us settings! If you fix all the 4 issues I had, then I will rate it 5 stars and say “Thank you!”.

title: The Thrilling World of Among Us.
text: Among Us is a unique and captivating multiplayer game that offers an engaging blend of strategy, teamwork, and deception. Set in the confines of a spacecraft, players are tasked with completing various tasks while also trying to suss out who among them is the imposter intent on sabotaging the mission. The game's simple yet effective graphics and intuitive gameplay mechanics make it accessible to players of all skill levels. What truly sets Among Us apart is its social dynamics - the thrill of trying to deceive or uncover the imposter among your friends is both exhilarating and immensely satisfying. I have thoroughly enjoyed my time playing Among Us with friends, as the game fosters camaraderie and competition in equal measure. The constant updates and new features ensure that the gameplay remains fresh and engaging over time. If you are seeking a multiplayer game that challenges your wit and fosters social interaction, Among Us is an excellent choice. Its combination of strategy, teamwork, and betrayal make for a truly unique gaming experience that is sure to provide hours of entertainment. Highly recommended for gamers of all backgrounds.

title: I love it! But…
text:
Dear, Among us developers,
Honestly, I’ve played among us for awhile. I’ve seen it grow over the years, and now it’s turned to something different! Which I rlly like! Yet, there’s one thing that annoys me. So, every time I join it tells me 2 times my Apple ID cannot be created because of apps or something. It really annoys me considering I want to be able to have access to free chat like a few years ago, and have my OWN name. I’m really frustrated at this situation :(. Hope you respond developers.
